no_parts.instructions: Tap the %1$s icon in the toolbar to insert a part.

coming_soon.instructions: You will be able to insert small sections of other blueprints here as snippets. You will be able to create a new snippet by going to Toolbar > %1$s Clipboard > %2$s Create Snippet.

no_selection.instructions: Click on a part either on the blueprint or in the sidebar to select it.

no_properties.instructions: The part(s) you have selected lack adjustable properties probably because they're either abstract or a work in progress.

constrain.hint: Maintains the ratio between X and Y scale
Maintains the ratio between X and Y scale

select_one_part.instructions: Select a single part to inspect the details of

landscape_prompt.message: Seems like you're in portrait mode. Please turn to landscape mode.%1$sIf you're on a desktop, this may be dismissed.

update.title: Stellar updated to a newer version
update.description: A restart is required to apply the changes. You can restart now or do it later.

installable.title: Stellar can now be installed!
installable.description: Stellar is a %1$sPWA%2$s and can be installed to your device for offline use and easy access.

1.title: Welcome!
1.description: Select a language to continue. Some languages may not be fully translated. Help us translate Stellar on %1$sCrowdin%2$s.

2.title: Pick a theme
2.description: Themes change the look and feel of the editor. Pick one that fits your needs.

unstable.title: Unstable version!
unstable.description: You are currently using %1$s, which can be highly unstable as it remains very untested. You may want to use %2$sthe beta version%3$s instead.

missing_parts.title: 1 part not imported
missing_parts.description: The following part was not imported because it doesn't exist in %1$s yet:
missing_parts.description_plural: The following parts were not imported because they don't exist in %1$s yet:

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Controls the color palette of the entire interface.

default_tab.title: Default tab
default_tab.description: Specifies which tab Stellar will open on launch by default.

touchscreen_mode.title: Touchscreen mode
touchscreen_mode.description: Controls how on-screen information is presented in compliance with your screen type.

language.title: Language
language.description: Specifies what language the text on screen is translated to. Help us translate Stellar to your language on %1$sCrowdin%2$s.

orientation_prompt.title: Orientation prompt
orientation_prompt.description: Shows a prompt when your device is oriented in portrait mode.

installation_prompt.title: Installation prompt
installation_prompt.description: Notifies you when Stellar detects the capability within your device to install it as a %1$sPWA%2$s. Your device may be eligible regardless of a notification.

instability_prompt.title: Instability warning
instability_prompt.description: Warns you when you're running an unstable or unknown version of Stellar.

missing_parts.title: Missing parts
missing_parts.description: Shows you a list of all the parts that could not be imported.

undo_limit.title: Undo limit
undo_limit.description: The maximum number of version history patches the editor should store. 4096 is the maximum; 16 is the minimum.

regress.title: Regress amount
regress.description: Reduces the canvas resolution when performing computationally expensive tasks like panning, scaling, rotation, etc. Lower the value, the more aggressive the regression.

format.title: Format Emitted files
format.description: Formats the JSON in files emitted by Stellar to be more readable.

watermark.title: Watermark exported blueprints
watermark.description: Adds a watermark linking to the version of Stellar used to generate the file.

default_name.title: Emitted file default name
default_name.description: The default name for any unnamed files that are exported by Stellar.

error_screen_debug.title: Show debug info on error screen
error_screen_debug.description: Displays the full error message and a source-mapped stack trace when a critical error interrupts Stellar.

confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to do this?
confirmation.description: This action is may not be reversible.
